promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic simple bull steel-type pokemon wearing regal gemstones. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or bull. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemtorus, a a gigantic simple bull steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Critical Collection. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bull", "steel" or "Gemtorus". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, bull-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This mountainous titan collects crystalline treasures, using its Critical Collection ability to power its rugged metallic body.
